content.en: Robotic path planning: Algorithms play a crucial role in path planning for robots in various environments. They are used to find optimal paths, smooth coverage paths, and generate obstacle-free paths for multiple robots. These algorithms improve navigation, increase average velocity, and reduce accelerations, making robot movement more efficient and safe. Researchers are constantly working on developing and improving algorithms to enhance the capabilities of autonomous robots in both known and unknown environments.
content.da: Robotters ruteplanlægning: Algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i ruteplanlægning for robotter i forskellige miljøer. De bruges til at finde optimale ruter, glatte dækningruter og generere forhindringsfri ruter for flere robotter. Disse algoritmer forbedrer navigationen, øger gennemsnitshastigheden og reducerer accelerationer, hvilket gør robotbevægelse mere effektiv og sikker. Forskere arbejder konstant på at udvikle og forbedre algoritmer for at forbedre de autonome robotters kapaciteter i både kendte og ukendte miljøer.
